data.name: Pixel Game Maker MV - Particle Set
data.detailed_description:
A package of ready-to-use Particle Sets in Pixel Game Maker MV!
With these, you can easily create original effects by altering the material type and color to your likings!

*******************************************
Particle: 52
・Weather: light rain
・Weather: Feather
・Weather: Heavy rain
・Weather: Spring Breeze
・Weather: Blowing snow
・Weather: Sand storm
・Wearher: Snow
・Weather: Firefly
・Weather: Fog
・Weather: Night Sky
・Weather: Space
・Weather: Forest
・bomb
・Fire magic circle - activation
・Shockwave
・Hit
・Heart (loop)
・Pillar of fire (loop)
・Get item
・Lawn grass
・Soft glow (loop)
・Shining Stars (loop)
・Lotus Particle
・Concentration
・Smoke (loop
・Fireworks
・Blood
・Enemy exploding
・Fireworks small
・Small bubbles (loop)
・Jack-in-a-box (loop)
・Charge attack aura (loop)
・Explosion (diagonal)
・Heart Flash
・Warp jump
・Water splatter
・Waterfall (loop
・Basin under a waterfall
・Dark aura(loop)
・Blue burst
・Feather burst
・Rock broken
・Crack (loop
・Concentration (small)
・Flame wall (loop)
・Green spark
・Thin rising effect (loop)
・Butterfly (loop)
・Thunderbolt (loop)
・Thunderbolt2 (loop)
・Ice (loop)
・Ice 2
How to check: Start test play and use keyboard "X" and "Z" to switch.
*******************************************
